basic.name: Thin
basic.description: grants immunity to the slow status.

basic.name: Thick
basic.description: grants immunity to the daze status.

basic.name: Sturdy
basic.description: grants immunity to the shaken status.

basic.name: Strong
basic.description: grants immunity to the weak status.

basic.name: Physicians
basic.description: grants immunity to all status effects.

basic.name: Magical
basic.description: targets Magic Defense instead of Defense.

basic.name: Multi
basic.description: attacks as if it has Multi(2)

Aerial.name: Whirlwind
Aerial.description: deals 5 extra damage during the first round of a conflict.

Aerial.name: Finesse
Aerial.description: this weapon is in your off-hand, you may use two-weapon fighting with it regardless of its category.

Aerial.name: Switch
Aerial.description: when you hit one or more creatures, you may immediately perform the Equipment action for free.

Aerial.name: Skybreaker
Aerial.description: grants immunity to damage dealt by flying creatures.

Aerial.name: Polarized
Aerial.description: when you cast a spell that targets a creature (not special) who is suffering from slow, that spell’s total MP cost is halved.

Aerial.name: Slipstream
Aerial.description: when you deal damage to a creature outside of your turn during a conflict, you deal 5 extra damage that creature.

Thunderous.name: Spiked
Thunderous.description: when you use a spell or skill to deal bolt damage to a creature, one ally you can see may take their turn (if that haven't) immediately after yours.

Thunderous.name: Shockwave
Thunderous.description: when damge dealt by this weapon causes one or more enemies to enter crisis, every enemy present in the scene suffers dazed.

Thunderous.name: Livewire
Thunderous.description: grants【half your level in the Elementalist Class】as extra damage to your Cataclysm Skill.

Thunderous.name: Conductor’s
Thunderous.description: when you use the Encourage Skill, the target recovers extra HP equal to【half your level】

Thunderous.name: Jolted
Thunderous.description: after a creature hits you with a melee attack, you deal 5 bolt damage to that creature.

Thunderous.name: Overcharged
Thunderous.description: when you deal damage with this weapon if at least one target is shaken, each target loses 20 Mind Points.

Paradox.name: Temporal
Paradox.description: deals 5 extra damage as long as you have exactly one other weapon equipped of a different category.

Paradox.name: Anomalous
Paradox.description: grants you the effects of the Mirror spell at the beginning of any conflict scene.

Paradox.name: Bound
Paradox.description: when you hit 2 targets with this weapon, you may tether them. when either loses HP due to damage they are Vulnerable to, the other loses 5 HP.

Paradox.name: Distorted
Paradox.description: when you score a critical success on a Magic Check for an offensive spell, that spell deals 5 extra damage.

Paradox.name: Echoing
Paradox.description: when an enemy in the scene heals from one or more status effects, roll a d8. That enemy suffers a status effect based on the number rolled: 1-2 dazed, 3-4 shaken, 5-6 slow, 7-8 weak.

Paradox.name: Faded
Paradox.description: causes enemies hit by this weapon to fade. If a fading enemy would recover HP, instead they recover no HP and stop fading.

Terrestrial.name: Earthward
Terrestrial.description: grants resistance to damage caused by environmental hazards.

Terrestrial.name: Deeproot
Terrestrial.description: when you recover HP, if you are in Crisis, you recover 5 additional HP.

Terrestrial.name: Trembling
Terrestrial.description: when you hit a creatures with this weapon, you recover an amount of Mind Points equal to your HR.

Terrestrial.name: Blooming
Terrestrial.description: when you heal an ally during a conflict, they gain resistance to physical damage till the start of your next turn.

Terrestrial.name: Runestone
Terrestrial.description: gives a +2 bonus to Magic Checks you perform for Elementalism Rituals, as long as it has a total MP cost equal to or lower than 60.

Terrestrial.name: Spinebreaker
Terrestrial.description: Your with weapons belonging to the heavy and/or spear Categories deal 5 extra damage.

Ardent.name: Dancing
Ardent.description: reduces that MP of the Bladestorm Skill by half when using this weapon.

Ardent.name: Shadowfire
Ardent.description: when you attack using the Shadow Strike Skill you may have the attack deal fire damage instead of dark damage.

Ardent.name: Cauterized
Ardent.description: deals 1 extra damage for every status effect you are suffering from.

Ardent.name: Bonded
Ardent.description: when you invoke a Bond during a Check, you recover 5 Mind Points.

Ardent.name: Silencing
Ardent.description: when you hit a creatures, that creature can't perform the Spell action during their next turn.

Ardent.name: Rapidfire
Ardent.description: Your attacks with weapons belonging to the bow and/or sword Categories deal 5 extra damage.

Glacial.name: Frostbitten
Glacial.description: when you enter Crisis for the first time during a conflict, deals 5 ice damage to every enemy present in the scene.

Glacial.name: Niveous
Glacial.description: makes Ice damage you deal ignore Immunities and Resistances.

Glacial.name: Rimebound
Glacial.description: when you start your turn in a conflict, each creature in the scene suffering from the weak status effect loses 5 HP.

Glacial.name: Brumal
Glacial.description: gives a +1 bonus to Defense and Magic Defense against attacks and offensive spells enraged creatures.

Glacial.name: Boreal
Glacial.description: when you deal ice damage to a creature, that creature suffers the slow status effect or loses 10 MP if already slowed.

Glacial.name: Gelid
Glacial.description: when you deal damage to a creature suffering from the weak status effect, you deal 5 extra damage to that creature.

Spiritual.name: Anima
Spiritual.description: when you end your turn, if you are merged with an Arcanum, you may heal from a single status effect of your choice.

Spiritual.name: Aetheric
Spiritual.description: deals 1 extra damage for each Bond of affection you have.

Spiritual.name: Auroral
Spiritual.description: as long as you are affected by a spell with a duration of “Scene”, all damage you deal ignores Resistances.

Spiritual.name: Spellbound
Spiritual.description: applies all bonuses you would apply to an Accuracy Check when using the Spellblade Skill with this weapon, to your Magic Check instead.

Spiritual.name: Vitalis
Spiritual.description: when you perform the Guard action and choose to cover an ally, that ally recovers 5 Hit Points.

Spiritual.name: Sylvan
Spiritual.description: grants resistance to dark, light, and poison damage.

Corrupted.name: Tarnished
Corrupted.description: when you cast a spell using the Spellblade Skill, any dark damage dealt by the spell ignores Immunities and Resistances.

Corrupted.name: Psychic
Corrupted.description: when you cast an offensive spell, treat the target’s Magic Defense as being equal to their Willpower die size.

Corrupted.name: Withering
Corrupted.description: makes Dark and poison damage you deal ignore Immunities and Resistances.

Corrupted.name: Malicious
Corrupted.description: when you cast a spell targeting a creature ( not special ) you have a Bond of hatred towards, that spell’s total MP cost is halved.

Corrupted.name: Overlord's
Corrupted.description: gives a +1 bonus to Defense and Magic Defense against attacks and offensive spells from shaken creatures.

Corrupted.name: Wraith
Corrupted.description: when you Counterattack with this weapon and hit the target, that target suffers the poisoned status effect.

Aquatic.name: Coral
Aquatic.description: when you reduce an enemy to 0 HP, you may treat your DEX as being one die size higher until the end of your next turn.

Aquatic.name: Barnacled
Aquatic.description: treats defense score with this weapon treat the Defense score of each target as being equal to their current Might die size.

Aquatic.name: Boreal
Aquatic.description: when you cast and resolve an offensive spell, you recover an amount of HP equal to the HR of the Magic Check.

Aquatic.name: Maleable
Aquatic.description: prevents attacks with this weapon from triggering counterattacks other reactive Skills.

Aquatic.name: Spring
Aquatic.description: if you cause one or more allies to recover HP, if that ally has full HP they recover 5 MP.

Aquatic.name: Misty
Aquatic.description: when you hit a creature during a single scene, you may reduce the damage of the next attack made against you by the HR of the last recorded hit.

Mechanical.name: Thief's
Mechanical.description: allows you to spend your opportunity to earn 100z.

Mechanical.name: Breaching
Mechanical.description: when you use the Breach SKill with this weapon, gain a +2 to your accuracy check.

Mechanical.name: Alchemist's
Mechanical.description: when you create a potion using Gadget (Alchemy), if at least two dice show the same mumber, your area and effect is chosen freely.

Mechanical.name: Magnetic
Mechanical.description: deals 5 additional damage to creatures with traits related to metal.

Mechanical.name: Bard's
Mechanical.description: when you use the Tavern Talk skill, you earn 200xSL zenit.

Mechanical.name: Energized
Mechanical.description: when you hit two or more creatures in a single turn with this weapon, it becomes charged.
